name: Scout
actions_desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
special_abilities_desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
description: A scout often uses light melee weapons, such as daggers and shortswords, and a small ranged weapon, like a shortbow or hand crossbow. They fight dirty, preferring to end the fight quick and are generally they are proficient in stealth and lock-picking.
